mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Medary [Madary, Medairy], Augustus
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Berlin, Sst. Co., PA [Berlin, Somerset County, Pennsylvania]]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Medary [Madary, Medairy], Augustus Patient Age: 42. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Debility from fatigue and exposure. Acute diarrhoea [diarrhea]. Result: Transferred for duty in kitchen. Mustered out and discharged from service .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medary [Madary, Medairy], Augustus
Debility from fatigue and exposure. Acute diarrhoea [diarrhea]
